system.description: A globe of force encloses the target and protects it from harm but also traps it. Nothing can pass through the sphere, including physical objects, energy, or spells. The subject can breathe inside and can push the sphere (1 foot per round). The sphere can be dispelled or destroyed (e.g. by a disintegrate spell).

components.materialDescription: A hemispherical piece of clear crystal and a matching hemispherical piece of gum arabic.
